text: Rudolf Vatinyan (; 12 May 1941 – 2 January 2021) was an Armenian cinematographer. He was born in Dilijan, Armenia. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 2009. He worked on the 1985 historical drama The Tango of Our Childhood. Vatinyan died on 2 January 2021 in Yerevan, Armenia at the age of 79.Умер Рудольф Ватинян – кинооператор "Песни прошедших дней" и "Танго нашего детства" ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Armenian filmmakers Category:Cinematographers Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Rudolf Vatinyan
